user.title: Add new device
user.description: Enter the ip address of your tapo device and tapo app credentials.

data.host: IP address or hostname of tapo device
data.track_device_mac: Try to track device dynamic ip using MAC address. (Your HA must be able to access to same network of device)

advanced_config.title: Advanced configuration
advanced_config.description: By customizing the polling rate unexpected behavior could happens. The device could even become unresponsive for a while.

error.invalid_path: The path provided is not valid. Should be in the format `user/repo-name` and should be a valid github repository.
